item.title: Get to start playing with tkinter
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I’m not sure what I’m going to build yet, but it should be something that could make my ops life easier, I don’t think it will be automation tool, as the best solution for automation is command line (script). Maybe something regarding to monitoring? Building up a dashboard will be interesting, though most people may [...]
item.content:encoded:
I’m not sure what I’m going to build yet, but it should be something that could make my ops life easier, I don’t think it will be automation tool, as the best solution for automation is command line (script).

Maybe something regarding to monitoring? Building up a dashboard will be interesting, though most people may use Web page instead.

Still thinking …
